name: wedding-website
description: Simple and beautiful wedding invitation website

scripts.render-build: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.ensureDir('public').then(() => Promise.all(['assets', 'css', 'dist', 'index.html', 'trangchu', 'admin', 'dashboard', 'login', 'admin.html', 'admindashboard.html', 'adminlogin.html'].map((f) => fs.copy(f, 'public/' + f)))).then(() => console.log('✅ Build successfully!'));"
scripts.build:public: npm run build && node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.ensureDir('public').then(() => Promise.all(['assets', 'css', 'dist', 'index.html', 'trangchu', 'admin', 'dashboard', 'login'].map((f) => fs.copy(f, 'public/' + f)))).then(() => console.log('✅ Successfully!'));"
